Contact Us

Thanks for contacting us, we'll be in touch soon!

Data for Democracy offers a variety of opportunities to suit all levels of commitment, skill, and experience. We welcome first-timers, and are keen to support them in their learning. Volunteering at Data for Democracy can entail anything from hanging out in Slack discussing ideas, to contributing periodic code commits, to leading a project of your own. Depending on your comfort level, you can contribute as intensively or as casually as you like!

Our Email:

team@datafordemocracy.org
